title: [Upper Trollfang]
description: The deep shadows cast by the towering walls of this narrow canyon bathe this area in constant darkness.  A few lacy ferns and a small amount of deep green moss grow near the trickles of water that seep from the myriad of tiny cracks that break up the sheer cliff face.
